sections.title: GSoC 2020: CDLI
text: In 2020, I did a Google Summer of Code (GSoC) project at the Cuneiform Digital Library Initiative (CDLI). There, I worked on making APIs and applying the CIDOC-CRM ontology to their data.

sections.title: ContentMine Fellowship
text: ContentMine is a project aiming to "demonstrate the usefulness of content mining and to provide tools and services to others." I participated in the ContentMine fellowships in 2016.

sections.title: npm Community Leader
text: Before the 2019 reorganization at npm I was Community Leader in their forum, npm.community. In that time, I made around 20 PRs to fix bugs in the existing codebase.

sections.title: Technasium
text: Technasium is a Dutch programme to introduce students from the age 13-18 to both technical studies and trade and industry, by facilitating students to search for projects at real-life companies, and to actually complete these projects.

sections.title: Citation.js
text: Citation.js converts formats like BibTeX, Wikidata JSON and BibJSON to CSL-JSON and other formats. Available as NPM module, CLI tool and browser JS library.

sections.title: kdljs
text: A JavaScript implementation of the KDL document language.

sections.title: SVM
text: Scalable Vector Models. SVG-like 3D-models for the web, focused on geometry. Currently converted to pure HTML. To dos: Finish specification and conversion to WebGL and A-Frame.

sections.title: svg-path
text: Parse and normalise SVG Path syntax. Includes code to detangle paths, i.e. rerouting the path to avoid intersections.
